Primeiro, lendo uma base com todas as datas para dar join com GTFS

```{sql connection = con}
create table Dates as
    with cte as (
        select date('2023-01-01') as dte union all
        select date(dte, '+1 day')
        from cte
        where dte <= '2024-04-18'
    )
select * from cte
```

```{sql connection= con}
select * from Dates
```
